refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts python variable into scilab variable.

listitem.para: Python variable to be converted to scilab variable.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Description
refsynopsisdiv.para: Converts a python variable to its Scilab equivalent if possible and returns it. Python numbers and floats are converted to double. Python lists, sets, tuples and other sequence objects are converted to scilab lists. Python dictionaries are converted to a list containing two lists, former containing the keys and the latter containing the values.
